Title: Relates to the creation of a "ebony alert system" for missing Black youth
Summary: Provides for the creation of an ebony alert system to be activated on behalf of Black youth, including young women, men, nonbinary, boys, and girls, who are reported missing under unexplained or suspicious circumstances, at risk, developmentally disabled, or cognitively impaired, or who have been abducted.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to the creation of a "ebony alert system" for missing Black youth
